channel.title: Blog on Luther Monson
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Luther Monson

item.title: Free Blog Hosting Using Hugo + Github Pages
item.description: Since I just rode this merry-go-round here is a quick overview of how you can achieve a professional looking personal blog with custom DNS with minimal effort at no cost and completely run out of a single Github Repository. Prerequisites You’ll need to do your own homework on how to use Hugo and you should have a Github account and have a decent understanding of using git and getting changes committed and pushed to a repo.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Getting a blog up and running to get some of the thoughts out of my head and into a markdown file. For reference on who I am please check out the about section and stay tuned for more content related to what it is I do everyday.
